==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|alt=山砦}}

===Etymology===
The use of "Shanzhai" to refer to imitation products comes from {{etyl|yue|cmn}} slang, in which "shanzhai factory" ({{zh-l|山寨廠}}) means an ill-equipped, low-end and family-based factory.
